author: Christopher Brito
title: UFC boss criticizes those who "run and hide," as experts say "stay home"
description: "It's like hiding from cancer. You can't hide," White said. "But I can't get cancer from shaking your hand," the interviewer replied.
content: While the sports world remains shut down by the coronavirus pandemic, UFC president Dana White criticized Americans who "run and hide" from COVID-19. The controversial remarks come as U.S. and world health officials urge people to stay at home and practice so… [+4774 chars]
